name: Grey Hope Ring Bearer Pillow
description:
A sweet ring bearer pillow that is perfect for your spring time wedding.Constructed with Eco-Fi felt, this lovely ring bearer pillow is both adorable and earth friendly!

As a courtesy this item will arrive gift wrapped.

measures 5.5" square

name: Plush Deconstructed Ruffle Christmas Tree Skirt
description:
Give your home a sweet touch of rustic beauty during the holidays with this simply darling tree skirt. The entire edge is lined with hand ruched ruffles. It is just so pretty and has the loveliest shabby chic feel.

Top layer is a natural ivory felt wool fabric. Underside and ruffles are created with unbleached natural cotton muslin.

This ivory tree skirt is constructed entirely of Eco friendly and sustainable products. The felt is manufactured by Kunin, and the Product name is Eco-Fi.
Light taupe translucent buttons with jute twine loop closure.

Available in ivory and white.

-measures approximately 50"D

*** Please allow up to 14 days from the date of purchase for product delivery ***

name: Breakthrough. Acrylic on Canvas Original.
description:
Radiant Sunflower bursting forth with color. I believe this is a prophetic piece that spoke of my daughters arrival.

Will be shipped with professional packing paper in secure box. 

now also available as an 8 x 10 print, $24

Please contact me to request a print.

name: Plush Ivory Christmas Tree Skirt
description:
An exquisite ivory Christmas tree skirt that is sure to add the perfect touch of whimsy to any tree during the holidays. Completely hand crafted and designed for a home with style and class. The entire edge is lined with numerous handmade natural cotton blooms.

This is an excellent alternative to the Garnet Hill Poinsettia tree skirt which is no longer available!

Top layer is a natural ivory felt wool fabric. Underside is unbleached natural cotton muslin. The flower lined edge creates a bit of weight, enabling it to drape nicely at the trim.

This ivory tree skirt is constructed entirely of Eco friendly and sustainable products. The felt is manufactured by Kunin, and the Product name is Eco-Fi.
Light taupe translucent buttons with jute twine loop closure.

Available in ivory and white.

-measures approximately 50"D

~Place your order now to ensure you will have it for the next holiday season~

*** Due to an overwhelming request for the "Plush Ivory Felt Tree Skirt", I am asking that you please allow 10 days from the date of purchase for product delivery.***

name: Tropical Leaf in jute Throw Pillow
description:
Hand stitched pillow cover, designed and crafted be me. Design inspired by my love of nature and plants. Organic cotton blend fabric combined with jute twine detail make an eco-friendly statement with tropical flair.

Raw Jute twine is a 100% biodegradable and pollution free natural material.

Listing for the pillow cover only. Fits standard 16"x16" pillow. Hidden envelope closure on the back.

All pillows are available in alternative sizes:

……14" x 14"……
